detailIntroText: Star Atlas is a next-gen gaming metaverse emerging from the confluence of state-of-the-art blockchain, real-time graphics, multiplayer video games, and decentralized financial technologies. It is being built on Unreal Engine 5, allowing for cinema-quality, real-time environments. Set in the year 2620, Star Atlas features a futuristic science fiction setting with three major factions competing for resources and control: humankind, a consortium of alien races, and sentient androids.
